price: Dan orang-orang yang diberi ilmu (ahli kitab) berpendapat bahwa wahyu yang diturunkan kepadamu dari Tuhan-mu itulah yang benar dan menunjuki (manusia) kepada jalan Tuhan Yang Maha Perkasa lagi Maha Terpuji.
arabic: وَيَرَى ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡعِلۡمَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡكَ مِن رَّبِّكَ هُوَ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَيَهۡدِيٓ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayarā alladhīna ūtū al-ʿil'ma alladhī unzila ilayka min rabbika huwa al-ḥaqa wayahdī ilā ṣirāṭi al-ʿazīzi al-ḥamīdi
